00031 BOOLEAN HandleDoorsOpenClose( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE * pStructure, BOOLEAN fNoAnimations );

00033 void HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fNoAnimations )
00034 {
00035       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
00036       DOOR_STATUS *           pDoorStatus;
00037       BOOLEAN                             fDoorsAnimated = FALSE;
00038 
00039       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00040 
00041       if ( pStructure == NULL )
00042       {
00043 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00044             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR: Told to handle door that does not exist at %d.", sGridNo );              
00045 #endif
00046             return;
00047       }
00048 
00049       fDoorsAnimated = HandleDoorsOpenClose( pSoldier, sGridNo, pStructure, fNoAnimations );
00050       if ( SwapStructureForPartner( sGridNo, pStructure ) != NULL)
00051       {
00052             RecompileLocalMovementCosts( sGridNo );
00053       }
00054 
00055 
00056       // set door busy
00057       pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( sGridNo );
00058       if ( pDoorStatus == NULL )
00059       {
00060 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00061             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR: Told to set door busy but can't get door status at %d!", sGridNo );
00062 #endif
00063             return;
00064       }
00065 
00066       // ATE: Only do if animated.....
00067       if ( fDoorsAnimated )
00068       {
00069             pDoorStatus->ubFlags |= DOOR_BUSY;
00070       }
00071 }

00073 UINT16 GetAnimStateForInteraction( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fDoor, UINT16 usAnimState )
00074 {
00075       switch( usAnimState )
00076       {
00077             case OPEN_DOOR:
00078 
00079       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CRIPPLECIV )
00080       {
00081         return( CRIPPLE_OPEN_DOOR );
00082       }
00083       else
00084       {
00085                     if ( fDoor )
00086                     {
00087                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00088                           {
00089                                 return( OPEN_DOOR_CROUCHED );
00090                           }
00091                           else
00092                           {
00093                                 return( usAnimState );
00094                           }
00095                     }
00096                     else
00097                     {
00098                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00099                           {
00100                                 return( BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT_CROUCHED );
00101                           }
00102                           else
00103                           {
00104                                 return( BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT );
00105                           }
00106                     }
00107       }
00108                   break;
00109 
00110             case CLOSE_DOOR:
00111 
00112       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CRIPPLECIV )
00113       {
00114         return( CRIPPLE_CLOSE_DOOR );
00115       }
00116       else
00117       {
00118                     if ( fDoor )
00119                     {
00120                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00121                           {
00122                                 return( CLOSE_DOOR_CROUCHED );
00123                           }
00124                           else
00125                           {
00126                                 return( usAnimState );
00127                           }
00128                     }
00129                     else
00130                     {
00131                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00132                           {
00133                                 return( OPEN_STRUCT_CROUCHED );
00134                           }
00135                           else
00136                           {
00137                                 return( OPEN_STRUCT );
00138                           }
00139                     }
00140       }
00141                   break;
00142 
00143             case END_OPEN_DOOR:
00144 
00145       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CRIPPLECIV )
00146       {
00147         return( CRIPPLE_END_OPEN_DOOR );
00148       }
00149       else
00150       {
00151                     if ( fDoor )
00152                     {
00153                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00154                           {
00155                                 return( END_OPEN_DOOR_CROUCHED );
00156                           }
00157                           else
00158                           {
00159                                 return( usAnimState );
00160                           }
00161                     }
00162                     else
00163                     {
00164                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00165                           {
00166                                 return( END_OPENSTRUCT_CROUCHED );
00167                           }
00168                           else
00169                           {
00170                                 return( END_OPENSTRUCT );
00171                           }
00172                     }
00173       }
00174                   break;
00175 
00176 
00177             case END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR:
00178 
00179       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CRIPPLECIV )
00180       {
00181         return( CRIPPLE_END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR );
00182       }
00183       else
00184       {
00185                     if ( fDoor )
00186                     {
00187                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00188                           {
00189                                 return( END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR_CROUCHED );
00190                           }
00191                           else
00192                           {
00193                                 return( END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR );
00194                           }
00195                     }
00196                     else
00197                     {
00198                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00199                           {
00200                                 return( END_OPENSTRUCT_LOCKED_CROUCHED );
00201                           }
00202                           else
00203                           {
00204                                 return( END_OPENSTRUCT_LOCKED );
00205                           }
00206                     }
00207       }
00208                   break;
00209 
00210             case PICK_LOCK:
00211 
00212                   if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00213                   {
00214         return( LOCKPICK_CROUCHED );
00215       }
00216       else
00217       {
00218         return( PICK_LOCK );
00219       }
00220       break;
00221 
00222             default:
00223                   // should never happen!
00224                   Assert( FALSE );
00225                   return( usAnimState );
00226                   break;
00227       }
00228 }

00230 
00231 void InteractWithClosedDoor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHandleCode )
00232 {
00233       pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode = ubHandleCode;
00234 
00235       switch( ubHandleCode )
00236       {
00237             case HANDLE_DOOR_OPEN:
00238             case HANDLE_DOOR_UNLOCK:
00239             case HANDLE_DOOR_EXAMINE:
00240             case HANDLE_DOOR_EXPLODE:
00241             case HANDLE_DOOR_LOCK:
00242             case HANDLE_DOOR_UNTRAP:
00243             case HANDLE_DOOR_CROWBAR:
00244 
00245                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, TRUE, OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00246                   break;
00247 
00248             case HANDLE_DOOR_FORCE:
00249 
00250                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, KICK_DOOR, 0 , FALSE );
00251                   break;
00252 
00253             case HANDLE_DOOR_LOCKPICK:
00254 
00255                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, TRUE, PICK_LOCK ), 0 , FALSE );
00256                   break;
00257       }
00258 
00259 }
00260 
00261 BOOLEAN DoTrapCheckOnStartingMenu( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, DOOR * pDoor )
00262 {
00263       INT8  bDetectLevel;
00264 
00265       if ( pDoor && pDoor->fLocked && pDoor->ubTrapID != NO_TRAP && pDoor->bPerceivedTrapped == DOOR_PERCEIVED_UNKNOWN )
00266       {
00267             // check for noticing the trap
00268             bDetectLevel = CalcTrapDetectLevel( pSoldier, FALSE );
00269             if (bDetectLevel >= pDoor->ubTrapLevel)
00270             {
00271                   // say quote, update status
00272                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BOOBYTRAP_ITEM );
00273                   UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00274 
00275       return( TRUE );
00276             }
00277       }
00278 
00279   return( FALSE );
00280 }
00281 
00282 void InteractWithOpenableStruct( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, STRUCTURE *pStructure, UINT8 ubDirection, BOOLEAN fDoor )
00283 {
00284       STRUCTURE *             pBaseStructure;
00285       BOOLEAN                             fDoMenu = FALSE;
00286       DOOR        *                       pDoor;
00287       DOOR_STATUS *           pDoorStatus;
00288   BOOLEAN         fTrapsFound = FALSE;
00289 
00290       pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00291 
00292       if ( fDoor )
00293       {
00294             // get door status, if busy then just return!
00295             pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00296             if ( pDoorStatus && (pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_BUSY) )
00297             {
00298                   // Send this guy into stationary stance....
00299                   EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
00300 
00301                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00302                   {
00303                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ DOOR_IS_BUSY ] );
00304                   }
00305       else
00306       {
00307             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Trying to open door and door is busy: %d", pSoldier->ubID ) );
00308       }
00309                   return;
00310             }
00311       }
00312 
00313       EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
00314 
00315       // Is the door opened?
00316       if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
00317       {
00318             if ( pSoldier->ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID && !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) )
00319             {
00320                   // Bring up menu to decide what to do....
00321                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
00322 
00323                   pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00324                   if ( pDoor )
00325                   {
00326                         if ( DoTrapCheckOnStartingMenu( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00327         {
00328           fTrapsFound = TRUE;
00329         }
00330                   }
00331 
00332                   // Pull Up Menu
00333       if ( !fTrapsFound )
00334       {
00335                     InitDoorOpenMenu( pSoldier, pStructure, ubDirection, TRUE );
00336       }
00337             }
00338             else
00339             {
00340                   // Easily close door....
00341                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, CLOSE_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00342             }
00343       }
00344       else
00345       {
00346             // Bring up the menu, only if it has a lock!
00347             if ( pSoldier->ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID )
00348             {
00349                   pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00350 
00351                   if ( pDoor != NULL )
00352                   {
00353         // Assume true
00354                         fDoMenu = TRUE;
00355 
00356         // Check if it's locked.....
00357         // If not locked, don't bring it up!
00358         if ( !pDoor->fLocked )
00359         {
00360           fDoMenu = FALSE;
00361         }
00362                   }
00363             }
00364 
00365             if ( fDoMenu )
00366             {
00367                   // Bring up menu to decide what to do....
00368                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
00369 
00370                   if ( DoTrapCheckOnStartingMenu( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00371       {
00372         fTrapsFound = TRUE;
00373       }
00374 
00375                   // Pull Up Menu
00376       if ( !fTrapsFound )
00377       {
00378                     InitDoorOpenMenu( pSoldier, pStructure, ubDirection, FALSE );
00379       }
00380       else
00381       {
00382                     UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
00383       }
00384             }
00385             else
00386             {
00387                   pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode = HANDLE_DOOR_OPEN;
00388 
00389                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00390             }
00391       }
00392 
00393 }
00394 
00395 void ProcessImplicationsOfPCMessingWithDoor( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00396 {
00397       UINT8                               ubRoom;
00398       SOLDIERTYPE *           pGoon;
00399       // if player is hacking at a door in the brothel and a kingpin guy can see him
00400       if ( (InARoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && IN_BROTHEL( ubRoom )) || (gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_D && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 && (pSoldier->sGridNo == 11010 || pSoldier->sGridNo == 11177 || pSoldier->sGridNo == 11176 ) ) )
00401       {
00402             UINT8       ubLoop;
00403 
00404             // see if a kingpin goon can see us
00405             for ( ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; ubLoop++ )
00406             {
00407                   pGoon = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ];
00408                   if ( pGoon->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP && pGoon->bActive && pGoon->bInSector && pGoon->bLife >= OKLIFE && pGoon->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
00409                   {
00410                         MakeCivHostile( pGoon, 2 );
00411                         if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
00412                         {
00413                               EnterCombatMode( pGoon->bTeam );
00414                         }
00415                   }
00416             }
00417       }
00418 
00419       if ( gWorldSectorX == TIXA_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == TIXA_SECTOR_Y )
00420       {
00421             pGoon = FindSoldierByProfileID( WARDEN, FALSE );
00422             if ( pGoon && pGoon->bAlertStatus < STATUS_RED && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pGoon->sGridNo ) <= 5 )
00423             {
00424                   // alert her if she hasn't been alerted
00425                   pGoon->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
00426                   CheckForChangingOrders( pGoon );
00427                   CancelAIAction( pGoon, TRUE );
00428             }
00429       }
00430 }

00434 BOOLEAN HandleOpenableStruct( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE *pStructure )
00435 {
00436       BOOLEAN fHandleDoor = FALSE;
00437       INT16       sAPCost = 0, sBPCost = 0;
00438       DOOR        *pDoor;
00439       BOOLEAN     fTrapFound = FALSE;
00440       BOOLEAN     fDoAction = TRUE;
00441       BOOLEAN     fDoor     = FALSE;
00442       INT8        bItemIn           = FALSE;
00443 
00444       // Are we a door?
00445       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR)
00446       {
00447             fDoor = TRUE;
00448       }
00449 
00450       // Calculate basic points...
00451 
00452       // We'll add any aps for things like lockpicking, booting, etc
00453 
00454       // If we are already open....no need for lockpick checks, etc
00455       if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
00456       {
00457             // Set costs for these
00458             sAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00459             sBPCost = BP_OPEN_DOOR;
00460 
00461             fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00462       }
00463       else
00464       {
00465             if ( pSoldier->ubID < 20 )
00466             {
00467                   // Find locked door here....
00468                   pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sGridNo );
00469 
00470                   // Alrighty, first check for traps ( unless we are examining.... )
00471                   if ( pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode != HANDLE_DOOR_EXAMINE && pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode != HANDLE_DOOR_UNTRAP && pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode != HANDLE_DOOR_UNLOCK )
00472                   {
00473                         if ( pDoor != NULL )
00474                         {
00475                               // Do we have a trap? NB if door is unlocked disable all traps
00476                               if (pDoor->fLocked && pDoor->ubTrapID != NO_TRAP)
00477                               {
00478 
00479                                     fTrapFound = TRUE;
00480 
00481                                     // Set costs for these
00482                                     // Set AP costs to that of opening a door
00483                                     sAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00484                                     sBPCost = BP_OPEN_DOOR;
00485       
00486                                     ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00487 
00488                                     // Did we inadvertently set it off?
00489                                     if ( HasDoorTrapGoneOff( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00490                                     {
00491                                           // Kaboom
00492                                           // Code to handle trap here...
00493                                           HandleDoorTrap( pSoldier, pDoor );
00494                                           if (DoorTrapTable[pDoor->ubTrapID].fFlags & DOOR_TRAP_STOPS_ACTION)
00495                                           {
00496                                                 // trap stops person from opening door!
00497                                                 fDoAction    = FALSE;
00498                                           }
00499                                           if (!( DoorTrapTable[pDoor->ubTrapID].fFlags & DOOR_TRAP_RECURRING ) )
00500                                           {
00501                                                 // trap only happens once
00502                                                 pDoor->ubTrapLevel = 0;
00503                                                 pDoor->ubTrapID = NO_TRAP;
00504                                           }
00505                                           UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00506                                     }
00507                                     else
00508                                     {
00509                                           // If we didn't set it off then we must have noticed it or know about it already
00510 
00511                                           // do we know it's trapped?
00512                                           if ( pDoor->bPerceivedTrapped == DOOR_PERCEIVED_UNKNOWN )
00513                                           {
00514                                                 switch( pDoor->ubTrapID )
00515                                                 {
00516                                                       case BROTHEL_SIREN:
00517                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ SIREN ] );
00518                                                             break;
00519                                                       case SUPER_ELECTRIC:
00520                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ ELECTRIC ] );
00521                                                             break;
00522                                                       default:
00523                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ pDoor->ubTrapID ] );
00524                                                             break;
00525                                                 }
00526 
00527                                                 // Stop action this time....
00528                                                 fDoAction    = FALSE;
00529 
00530                                                 // report!
00531                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BOOBYTRAP_ITEM );
00532                                           }
00533                                           else
00534                                           {
00535                                                 // Set it off!
00536                                                 HandleDoorTrap( pSoldier, pDoor );
00537                                                 if (DoorTrapTable[pDoor->ubTrapID].fFlags & DOOR_TRAP_STOPS_ACTION)
00538                                                 {
00539                                                       // trap stops person from opening door!
00540                                                       fDoAction    = FALSE;
00541                                                 }
00542                                                 if (!( DoorTrapTable[pDoor->ubTrapID].fFlags & DOOR_TRAP_RECURRING ) )
00543                                                 {
00544                                                       // trap only happens once
00545                                                       pDoor->ubTrapLevel = 0;
00546                                                       pDoor->ubTrapID = NO_TRAP;
00547                                                 }
00548                                           }
00549                                           UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00550 
00551                                     }
00552                               }
00553                         }
00554                   }
00555 
00556                   if ( fDoAction )
00557                   {
00558                         // OK, switch based on how we are going to open door....
00559                         switch( pSoldier->ubDoorHandleCode )
00560                         {
00561                               case HANDLE_DOOR_OPEN:
00562 
00563                                     // If we have no lock on door...
00564                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00565                                     {
00566                                           // Set costs for these
00567                                           sAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00568                                           sBPCost = BP_OPEN_DOOR;
00569 
00570                                           // Open if it's not locked....
00571                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00572                                           fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00573                                           break;
00574                                     }
00575                                     else
00576                                     {
00577                                           if ( pDoor->fLocked )
00578                                           {
00579                                                 // it's locked....
00580                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00581 
00582                                                 // Do we have a quote for locked stuff?
00583                                                 // Now just show on message bar
00584                                                 if ( !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
00585                                                 {
00586                                                       DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_LOCKED );                     
00587                                                 }
00588                                                 else
00589                                                 {
00590                                                       ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_BEEN_LOCKED_STR ] );
00591                                                 }
00592                                           }
00593                                           else
00594                                           {
00595                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00596                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00597                                           }
00598                                           UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00599                                           break;
00600                                     }
00601                                     break;
00602                   
00603                               case HANDLE_DOOR_FORCE:
00604 
00605                                     // Set costs for these
00606                                     sAPCost = AP_BOOT_DOOR;
00607                                     sBPCost = BP_BOOT_DOOR;
00608 
00609                                     // OK, using force, if we have no lock, just open the door!
00610                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00611                                     {
00612                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00613                                           fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00614 
00615                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00616                                     }
00617                                     else
00618                                     {
00619                                           // Attempt to force door
00620                                           if ( AttemptToSmashDoor( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00621                                           {
00622                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00623                                                 // DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00624                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00625                                           }
00626                                           else
00627                                           {
00628                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_NOT_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00629                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00630                                           }
00631                                           ProcessImplicationsOfPCMessingWithDoor( pSoldier );
00632                                     }
00633                                     break;
00634 
00635 
00636                               case HANDLE_DOOR_CROWBAR:
00637 
00638                                     // Set costs for these
00639                                     sAPCost = AP_USE_CROWBAR;
00640                                     sBPCost = BP_USE_CROWBAR;
00641 
00642                                     // OK, using force, if we have no lock, just open the door!
00643                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00644                                     {
00645                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00646                                           fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00647 
00648                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00649                                     }
00650                                     else
00651                                     {
00652                                           // Attempt to force door
00653                                           if ( AttemptToCrowbarLock( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00654                                           {
00655                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00656                                                 //DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00657                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00658                                           }
00659                                           else
00660                                           {
00661                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_NOT_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00662                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00663                                           }
00664 
00665                                           ProcessImplicationsOfPCMessingWithDoor( pSoldier );
00666                                     }
00667                                     break;
00668 
00669                               case HANDLE_DOOR_EXPLODE:
00670 
00671                                     // Set costs for these
00672                                     sAPCost = AP_EXPLODE_DOOR;
00673                                     sBPCost = BP_EXPLODE_DOOR;
00674 
00675                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00676                                     {
00677                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00678                                     }
00679                                     else
00680                                     {
00681                                           // Attempt to force door
00682                                           if ( AttemptToBlowUpLock( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00683                                           {
00684                                                 //DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00685                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00686                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00687                                           }
00688                                           else
00689                                           {
00690                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_NOT_DESTROYED_STR ] );
00691                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00692                                           }
00693                                           ProcessImplicationsOfPCMessingWithDoor( pSoldier );
00694                                     }
00695                                     break;
00696 
00697                               case HANDLE_DOOR_LOCKPICK:
00698 
00699                                     // Set costs for these
00700                                     sAPCost = AP_PICKLOCK;
00701                                     sBPCost = BP_PICKLOCK;
00702 
00703                                     // Attempt to pick lock
00704                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00705                                     {
00706                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00707                                     }
00708                                     else
00709                                     {
00710                                           if ( AttemptToPickLock( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00711                                           {
00712                                                 DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00713                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_BEEN_PICKED_STR ] );
00714                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00715                                           }
00716                                           else
00717                                           {
00718                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_NOT_BEEN_PICKED_STR ] );
00719                                           }
00720                                           ProcessImplicationsOfPCMessingWithDoor( pSoldier );
00721                                     }
00722                                     break;
00723 
00724 
00725                               case HANDLE_DOOR_EXAMINE:
00726 
00727                                     // Set costs for these
00728                                     sAPCost = AP_EXAMINE_DOOR;
00729                                     sBPCost = BP_EXAMINE_DOOR;
00730 
00731                                     // Attempt to examine door
00732                                     // Whatever the result, end the open animation
00733                                     ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00734 
00735                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00736                                     {
00737                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00738                                     }
00739                                     else
00740                                     {
00741                                           if ( ExamineDoorForTraps( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00742                                           {
00743                                                 // We have a trap. Use door pointer to determine what type, etc
00744                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BOOBYTRAP_ITEM );
00745                                                 switch( pDoor->ubTrapID )
00746                                                 {
00747                                                       case BROTHEL_SIREN:
00748                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ SIREN ] );
00749                                                             break;
00750                                                       case SUPER_ELECTRIC:
00751                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ ELECTRIC ] );
00752                                                             break;
00753                                                       default:
00754                                                             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_DESCRIPTION_STR ], pDoorTrapStrings[ pDoor->ubTrapID ] );
00755                                                             break;
00756                                                 }
00757 
00758                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00759                                           }
00760                                           else
00761                                           {
00762                                                 ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_UNTRAPPED_STR ] );
00763                                           }
00764                                     }
00765                                     break;
00766 
00767 
00768                               case HANDLE_DOOR_UNLOCK:
00769 
00770                                     // Set costs for these
00771                                     sAPCost = AP_UNLOCK_DOOR;
00772                                     sBPCost = BP_UNLOCK_DOOR;
00773 
00774                                     // OK, if we have no lock, show that!
00775                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00776                                     {
00777                                           // Open if it's not locked....
00778                                           //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00779                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00780                                           break;
00781                                     }
00782                                     else
00783                                     {
00784 
00785                                           // it's locked....
00786                                           // Attempt to unlock....
00787                                           if ( AttemptToUnlockDoor( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00788                                           {
00789                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_BEEN_UNLOCKED_STR ] );
00790                                                 //DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00791 
00792                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00793                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00794 
00795                                                 fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00796                                           }
00797                                           else
00798                                           {
00799                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00800                                                 // Do we have a quote for locked stuff?
00801                                                 // Now just show on message bar
00802                                                 //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_NOT_PROPER_KEY_STR ], pSoldier->name );
00803 
00804                                                 // OK PLay damn battle sound
00805                                                 if ( Random( 2 ) )
00806                                                 {
00807                                                       DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
00808                                                 }
00809                                           }
00810                                     }
00811                                     break;
00812 
00813 
00814                               case HANDLE_DOOR_UNTRAP:
00815 
00816                                     // Set costs for these
00817                                     sAPCost = AP_UNTRAP_DOOR;
00818                                     sBPCost = BP_UNTRAP_DOOR;
00819 
00820                                     // OK, if we have no lock, show that!
00821                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00822                                     {
00823                                           // Open if it's not locked....
00824                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00825                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00826                                           break;
00827                                     }
00828                                     else
00829                                     {
00830                                           // Do we have a trap?
00831                                           if (pDoor->ubTrapID != NO_TRAP)
00832                                           {
00833                                                 fTrapFound = TRUE;
00834                                           }
00835 
00836                                           if ( fTrapFound )
00837                                           {
00838                                                 if ( AttemptToUntrapDoor( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00839                                                 {
00840                                                       //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_BEEN_UNTRAPPED_STR ] );
00841                                                       DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
00842                                                       ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00843                                                       UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00844                                                       //fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00845                                                 }
00846                                                 else
00847                                                 {                                                     
00848                                                       ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00849                                                       // Now just show on message bar
00850                                                       HandleDoorTrap( pSoldier, pDoor );
00851 
00852                                                       if (!( DoorTrapTable[pDoor->ubTrapID].fFlags & DOOR_TRAP_RECURRING ) )
00853                                                       {
00854                                                             // trap only happens once
00855                                                             pDoor->ubTrapLevel = 0;
00856                                                             pDoor->ubTrapID = NO_TRAP;
00857                                                       }
00858 
00859                                                       // Update perceived lock value
00860                                                       UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00861                                                 }
00862                                           }
00863                                           else
00864                                           {
00865                                                 ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_IS_NOT_TRAPPED_STR ] );
00866                                           }
00867                                     }
00868                                     break;
00869 
00870 
00871                               case HANDLE_DOOR_LOCK:
00872 
00873                                     // Set costs for these
00874                                     sAPCost = AP_LOCK_DOOR;
00875                                     sBPCost = BP_LOCK_DOOR;
00876 
00877                                     // OK, if we have no lock, show that!
00878                                     if ( pDoor == NULL )
00879                                     {
00880                                           // Open if it's not locked....
00881                                           ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_THERE_IS_NO_LOCK_STR ] );
00882                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00883                                           break;
00884                                     }
00885                                     else
00886                                     {
00887 
00888                                           // it's locked....
00889                                           // Attempt to unlock....
00890                                           if ( AttemptToLockDoor( pSoldier, pDoor ) )
00891                                           {
00892                                                 ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCK_HAS_BEEN_LOCKED_STR ] );
00893                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00894                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00895                                           }
00896                                           else
00897                                           {
00898                                                 ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00899                                                 // Do we have a quote for locked stuff?
00900                                                 // Now just show on message bar
00901                                                 ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ DOOR_NOT_PROPER_KEY_STR ], pSoldier->name );
00902 
00903                                                 // Update perceived lock value
00904                                                 UpdateDoorPerceivedValue( pDoor );
00905                                           }
00906                                     }
00907                                     break;
00908                         }
00909                   }
00910             }
00911             else
00912             {
00913                   // Set costs for these
00914                   sAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00915                   sBPCost = BP_OPEN_DOOR;
00916 
00917                   // Open if it's not locked....
00918                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GetAnimStateForInteraction( pSoldier, fDoor, END_OPEN_DOOR ), 0, FALSE );
00919                   fHandleDoor = TRUE;
00920             }
00921       }
00922 
00923       if ( fHandleDoor )
00924       {
00925             if ( fDoor )
00926             {
00927                   HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( pSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE );
00928             }
00929             else
00930             {
00931                   HandleStructChangeFromGridNo( pSoldier, sGridNo );
00932             }
00933       }
00934 
00935       // Deduct points!
00936       //if ( fDoor )
00937       {
00938             DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost );
00939       }
00940 
00941       return( fHandleDoor );
00942 }
00943 
00944 
00945 BOOLEAN HandleDoorsOpenClose( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE * pStructure, BOOLEAN fNoAnimations  )
00946 {
00947       LEVELNODE   * pShadowNode;
00948       LEVELNODE * pNode;
00949       INT32                   cnt;
00950       BOOLEAN                             fOpenedGraphic = FALSE;
00951       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00952       BOOLEAN                             fDoAnimation = TRUE;
00953       STRUCTURE * pBaseStructure;
00954       UINT32                  uiSoundID;
00955 
00956       pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00957       if (!pBaseStructure)
00958       {
00959             return( FALSE );
00960       }
00961 
00962       pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pBaseStructure->sGridNo, pBaseStructure );
00963       if (!pNode)
00964       {
00965             return( FALSE );
00966       }
00967 
00968       // ATE: if we are about to swap, but have an animation playing here..... stop the animation....
00969       if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION ) )
00970       {
00971             if ( pNode->pAniTile != NULL )
00972             {
00973                   if ( pNode->pAniTile->uiFlags & ANITILE_DOOR )
00974                   {
00975                         // ATE: No two doors can exist ( there can be only one )
00976                         // Update value.. ie: prematurely end door animation
00977                         // Update current frame...
00978 
00979                         if ( pNode->pAniTile->uiFlags & ANITILE_FORWARD )
00980                         {
00981                               pNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->pAniTile->sStartFrame + pNode->pAniTile->usNumFrames;
00982                         }
00983 
00984                         if ( pNode->pAniTile->uiFlags & ANITILE_BACKWARD )
00985                         {
00986                               pNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->pAniTile->sStartFrame - pNode->pAniTile->usNumFrames;
00987                         }
00988 
00989                         pNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->pAniTile->usNumFrames - 1;
00990 
00991                         // Delete...
00992                         DeleteAniTile( pNode->pAniTile );
00993 
00994                         pNode->uiFlags &= ~( LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC | LEVELNODE_UPDATESAVEBUFFERONCE );
00995 
00996                         if ( GridNoOnScreen( pBaseStructure->sGridNo ) )
00997                         {
00998                               SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00999                         }
01000                   }
01001             }     
01002       }
01003 
01004 
01005       pShadowNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pShadowHead;
01006 
01007 
01008       // Check the graphic which is down!
01009       // Check for Open Door!
01010       cnt = 0;
01011       while( gOpenDoorList[ cnt ] != -1 )
01012       {
01013             // IF WE ARE A SHADOW TYPE
01014             if ( pNode->usIndex == gOpenDoorList[ cnt ] )
01015             {
01016                   fOpenedGraphic = TRUE;
01017                   break;
01018             }
01019             cnt++;
01020       };
01021 
01022 
01023       if ( !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
01024       {
01025             //ATE, the last parameter is the perceived value, I dont know what it is so could you please add the value?
01026             //ModifyDoorStatus( INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fOpen, BOOLEAN fPercievedOpen )
01027             if ( gfSetPerceivedDoorState )
01028             {
01029                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, TRUE, TRUE );
01030             }
01031             else
01032             {
01033                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, TRUE, DONTSETDOORSTATUS );
01034             }
01035 
01036             if ( gWorldSectorX == 13 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_I )
01037             {
01038                   DoPOWPathChecks();
01039             }
01040 
01041             if (pSoldier )
01042             {
01043                   // OK, Are we a player merc or AI?
01044                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01045                   {
01046                         // If an AI guy... do LOS check first....
01047                         // If guy is visible... OR fading...
01048                         if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && !AllMercsLookForDoor( sGridNo, FALSE ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS ) )
01049                         {
01050                               fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01051                         }
01052                   }
01053             }
01054             else
01055             {
01056                   // door opening by action item... just do a LOS check
01057                   if ( !AllMercsLookForDoor( sGridNo, FALSE ) )
01058                   {
01059                         fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01060                   }
01061             }
01062 
01063             if ( fNoAnimations )
01064             {
01065                   fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01066             }
01067 
01068             if ( fDoAnimation  )    
01069             {
01070                   // Update perceived value
01071                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, DONTSETDOORSTATUS, TRUE );
01072 
01073                   if ( fOpenedGraphic )
01074                   {
01075                         memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
01076                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
01077                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01078                         AniParams.usTileType                        = (UINT16)gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].fType;
01079                         AniParams.usTileIndex                           = pNode->usIndex;
01080                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01081                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
01082                         AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_DOOR | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE;
01083                         AniParams.pGivenLevelNode                 = pNode;
01084                         
01085                         CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01086                   }
01087                   else
01088                   {
01089                         memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
01090                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
01091                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01092                         AniParams.usTileType                        = (UINT16)gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].fType;
01093                         AniParams.usTileIndex                           = pNode->usIndex;
01094                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01095                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
01096                         AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_DOOR | ANITILE_BACKWARD | ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE;
01097                         AniParams.pGivenLevelNode                 = pNode;
01098 
01099                         CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01100                   }
01101             }
01102 
01103             // SHADOW STUFF HERE
01104             //if ( pShadowNode != NULL )
01105             //{
01106             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION;
01107             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_PLAYONCE;
01108             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_FORWARD;
01109             //    if ( pShadowNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_BACKWARD )
01110             //          pShadowNode->uiFlags ^= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_BACKWARD;
01111             //    pShadowNode->sDelay           = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01112             //}
01113 
01114             if ( fDoAnimation && pSoldier && pSoldier->ubDoorOpeningNoise)
01115             {
01116                   // ATE; Default to normal door...
01117                   uiSoundID = ( DROPEN_1 + Random( 3 ) );
01118 
01119                   // OK, check if this door is sliding and is multi-tiled...
01120                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLIDINGDOOR )
01121                   {
01122                         // Get database value...
01123                         if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles > 1 )
01124                         {
01125                               // change sound ID
01126                               uiSoundID = GARAGE_DOOR_OPEN;
01127                         }
01128             else if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_CLOTH )
01129                   {
01130                         // change sound ID
01131                         uiSoundID = CURTAINS_OPEN;
01132                     }
01133       }
01134       else if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_LIGHT_METAL ||
01135            pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_THICKER_METAL ||
01136            pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_HEAVY_METAL )
01137                   {
01138                         // change sound ID
01139                         uiSoundID = METAL_DOOR_OPEN;
01140                   }
01141 
01142                   // OK, We must know what sound to play, for now use same sound for all doors...
01143                   PlayJA2Sample( uiSoundID, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                
01144             }
01145 
01146       }
01147       else
01148       {
01149             //ATE, the last parameter is the perceived value, I dont know what it is so could you please add the value?
01150             //ModifyDoorStatus( INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fOpen, BOOLEAN fInitiallyPercieveOpen )
01151 
01152             if ( gfSetPerceivedDoorState )
01153             {
01154                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
01155             }
01156             else
01157             {
01158                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, FALSE, DONTSETDOORSTATUS );
01159             }
01160 
01161             if (pSoldier )
01162             {
01163                   // OK, Are we a player merc or AI?
01164                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01165                   {
01166                         // If an AI guy... do LOS check first....
01167                         // If guy is visible... OR fading...
01168                         if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && !AllMercsLookForDoor( sGridNo, FALSE ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS ) )
01169                         {
01170                               fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01171                         }
01172                   }
01173             }
01174             else
01175             {
01176                   // door opening by action item... just do a LOS check
01177                   if ( !AllMercsLookForDoor( sGridNo, FALSE ) )
01178                   {
01179                         fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01180                   }
01181             }
01182 
01183             if ( fNoAnimations )
01184             {
01185                   fDoAnimation = FALSE;
01186             }
01187 
01188             if ( fDoAnimation )
01189             {
01190                   // Update perceived value
01191                   ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, DONTSETDOORSTATUS, FALSE );
01192 
01193                   memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
01194       
01195                   // ATE; Default to normal door...
01196                   uiSoundID = ( DRCLOSE_1 + Random( 2 ) );
01197 
01198                   // OK, check if this door is sliding and is multi-tiled...
01199                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLIDINGDOOR )
01200                   {
01201                         // Get database value...
01202                         if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles > 1 )
01203                         {
01204                               // change sound ID
01205                               uiSoundID = GARAGE_DOOR_CLOSE;
01206                         }
01207         else if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_CLOTH )
01208                     {
01209                           // change sound ID
01210                           uiSoundID = CURTAINS_CLOSE;
01211                     }
01212       }
01213               else if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_LIGHT_METAL ||
01214            pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_THICKER_METAL ||
01215            pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_HEAVY_METAL )
01216                   {
01217                         // change sound ID
01218                         uiSoundID = METAL_DOOR_CLOSE;
01219                   }
01220 
01221           AniParams.uiKeyFrame1Code             = ANI_KEYFRAME_DO_SOUND;
01222           AniParams.uiUserData                              = uiSoundID;
01223           AniParams.uiUserData3                             = sGridNo;
01224 
01225 
01226                   if ( fOpenedGraphic )
01227                   {
01228                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
01229                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01230                         AniParams.usTileType                        = (UINT16)gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].fType;
01231                         AniParams.usTileIndex                           = pNode->usIndex;
01232                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01233                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
01234                         AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_DOOR | ANITILE_BACKWARD | ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE;
01235                         AniParams.pGivenLevelNode                 = pNode;
01236 
01237           AniParams.ubKeyFrame1                             = pNode->sCurrentFrame - 2;
01238         
01239                         CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01240                   }
01241                   else
01242                   {                 
01243                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
01244                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01245                         AniParams.usTileType                        = (UINT16)gTileDatabase[ pNode->usIndex ].fType;
01246                         AniParams.usTileIndex                           = pNode->usIndex;
01247                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01248                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
01249                         AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_DOOR | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE;
01250                         AniParams.pGivenLevelNode                 = pNode;
01251       
01252             AniParams.ubKeyFrame1                           = pNode->sCurrentFrame + 2;
01253           
01254                         CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01255                   }
01256             }
01257 
01258             //if ( pShadowNode != NULL )
01259             //{
01260             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION;
01261             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_PLAYONCE;
01262             //    pShadowNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_BACKWARD;
01263             //    if ( pShadowNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_FORWARD )
01264             //          pShadowNode->uiFlags ^= LEVELNODE_ANIMATION_FORWARD;
01265             //    pShadowNode->sDelay           = INTTILE_DOOR_OPENSPEED;
01266             //}
01267 
01268       }
01269 
01270       if ( fDoAnimation )
01271       {
01272             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY;
01273             // FOR THE NEXT RENDER LOOP, RE-EVALUATE REDUNDENT TILES
01274             InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
01275 
01276             if ( GridNoOnScreen( sGridNo ) )
01277             {
01278                   SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
01279             }
01280       }
01281 
01282       return( fDoAnimation );
01283 }
01284 
01285 void SetDoorString( INT16 sGridNo )
01286 {
01287       DOOR        *pDoor;
01288       DOOR_STATUS *           pDoorStatus;
01289       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
01290 
01291       BOOLEAN     fTrapped = FALSE;
01292 
01293       // Try and get a door if one exists here
01294       pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sGridNo );
01295 
01296       if ( gfUIIntTileLocation == FALSE )
01297       {
01298             if ( pDoor == NULL )
01299             {
01300                   wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, TacticalStr[ DOOR_DOOR_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01301                   gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01302             }
01303             else
01304             {
01305                   wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, TacticalStr[ DOOR_DOOR_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01306                   gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01307 
01308                   // CHECK PERCEIVED VALUE
01309                   switch( pDoor->bPerceivedTrapped )
01310                   {
01311                         case DOOR_PERCEIVED_TRAPPED:
01312                         
01313                               wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, TacticalStr[ DOOR_TRAPPED_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01314                               gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01315                               fTrapped = TRUE;
01316                               break;
01317                   }
01318 
01319                   if ( !fTrapped )
01320                   {
01321                         // CHECK PERCEIVED VALUE
01322                         switch( pDoor->bPerceivedLocked )
01323                         {
01324                               case DOOR_PERCEIVED_UNKNOWN:
01325                               
01326                                     break;
01327 
01328                               case DOOR_PERCEIVED_LOCKED:
01329                               
01330                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, TacticalStr[ DOOR_LOCKED_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01331                                     gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01332                                     break;
01333 
01334                               case DOOR_PERCEIVED_UNLOCKED:
01335                               
01336                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, TacticalStr[ DOOR_UNLOCKED_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01337                                     gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01338                                     break;
01339 
01340                               case DOOR_PERCEIVED_BROKEN:
01341                               
01342                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, TacticalStr[ DOOR_BROKEN_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01343                                     gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01344                                     break;
01345 
01346                         }
01347                   }
01348 
01349             }     
01350       }
01351 
01352       // ATE: If here, we try to say, opened or closed...
01353       if ( gfUIIntTileLocation2 == FALSE )
01354       {
01355 #ifdef GERMAN
01356 
01357                   wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, TacticalStr[ DOOR_DOOR_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION ] );
01358                   gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01359 
01360                   // Try to get doors status here...
01361                   pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( sGridNo );
01362                   if ( pDoorStatus == NULL || ( pDoorStatus != NULL && pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_NOTSET ) )
01363                   {
01364                         // OK, get status based on graphic.....
01365                         pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
01366                         if (pStructure)
01367                         {
01368                               if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
01369                               {
01370                                     // Door is opened....
01371                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_OPENED ] );
01372                                     gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01373                               }
01374                               else
01375                               {
01376                                     // Door is closed
01377                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CLOSED ] );
01378                                     gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01379                               }
01380                         }
01381                   }
01382                   else
01383                   {
01384                         // Use percived value
01385                         if ( pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_OPEN )
01386                         {
01387                               // Door is opened....
01388                               wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_OPENED ] );
01389                               gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01390                         }
01391                         else
01392                         {
01393                               // Door is closed
01394                               wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CLOSED ] );
01395                               gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
01396                         }
01397                   }
01398 #else
01399 
01400                   // Try to get doors status here...
01401                   pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( sGridNo );
01402                   if ( pDoorStatus == NULL || ( pDoorStatus != NULL && pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_NOTSET ) )
01403                   {
01404                         // OK, get status based on graphic.....
01405                         pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
01406                         if (pStructure)
01407                         {
01408                               if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
01409                               {
01410                                     // Door is opened....
01411                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, pMessageStrings[ MSG_OPENED ] );
01412                                     gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01413                               }
01414                               else
01415                               {
01416                                     // Door is closed
01417                                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CLOSED ] );
01418                                     gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01419                               }
01420                         }
01421                   }
01422                   else
01423                   {
01424                         // Use percived value
01425                         if ( pDoorStatus->ubFlags & DOOR_PERCEIVED_OPEN )
01426                         {
01427                               // Door is opened....
01428                               wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, pMessageStrings[ MSG_OPENED ] );
01429                               gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01430                         }
01431                         else
01432                         {
01433                               // Door is closed
01434                               wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation2, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CLOSED ] );
01435                               gfUIIntTileLocation2 = TRUE;
01436                         }
01437                   }
01438 
01439 #endif
01440       }
01441 
01442 }
